title: There Were Surprises In The Crypto Bill: Rettig
full_text: There Were Surprises In The Crypto Bill: Rettig. "There were surprises in the bill," says Rebecca Rettig, who has been in the room for some of the negotiations as the Senate Banking Committee crafts the.... "There were surprises in the bill," says Rebecca Rettig, who has been in the room for some of the negotiations as the Senate Banking Committee crafts the crypto market-structure bill. She also serves… [+255 chars]
